summary: After his younger son falls prey to a corrupt police officer, an honest old man summons his estranged elder son to save the day.

Lyons|Sanjay Mishra|Rishiraj Pawar|Sonakshi Sinha|Mukesh Tiwari|Swantatra Bharat
keywords: brother brother reunion|rock quarry|psychopath|father disowns son|father son reconciliation
title: Boss
